DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety vaccination schedule consist two vaccination ( 21-35 day apart ) tick-borne encephalitis ( TBE ) vaccine FSME-IMMUN NEW ( 5 consecutive lot ) comparison another licensed TBE vaccine ( EncepurÂ® adult , polygeline ) ( 2 lot ) healthy volunteer age 16 65 year .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Volunteers From 16 65 Years Age : FSME IMMUN NEW vs. ENCEPUR
DOC.criteria: Male female volunteer eligible participation study : Were 16 year ( 16th birthday ) 65 year ( last day 65th birthday ) old Were clinically healthy Had negative pregnancy test first medical examination , female capable bearing child Agreed employ adequate birth control measure duration study , female capable bearing child Provided write informed consent For volunteer 18 year age write informed consent parent / guardian available Agreed keep volunteer diary History previous TBE vaccination History TBE infection show evidence latent TBE infection ( demonstrated screening ELISA > 126 VIEU/ml ) History allergic reaction , particular one component vaccine Previously receive volume substitution product contain polygeline ( stabilizer ENCEPUR ) Received antipyretic within 4 hour prior first TBE vaccination Suffer disease effectively treat stabilized Suffering disease ( e.g . autoimmune disease ) undergo form treatment could expect influence immunological function Suffering chronic , degenerative and/or inflammatory disease central nervous system Using immunosuppressive drug ( e.g . local systemic corticosteroid , chemotherapeutics ) Had know suspect problem drug alcohol abuse ( > 4 liter wine / week equivalent level alcoholic beverage ) Had donate blood plasma within one month study start Had receive bank blood immunoglobulin within one month study entry Known HIV positive ( special HIV test require purpose study ) Suffering febrile illness study entry History vaccination yellow fever / Japanese B encephalitis Participating simultaneously another clinical trial If female : pregnant breast feeding
